ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Product_Employee_Count_Change_Reason__c, "Other") && LEN( Employee_Count_Change_Reason_Notes__c ) < 1 && Product_Plan_Code__c = "1010" && NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name,"System Administrator") ), TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please use the Employee Count Change Reason Notes field to describe the other reason for the change in Employee Count.
